bcmdModel¶

class bayescmd.bcmdModel.ModelBCMD(model_name, inputs=None, params=None, times=None, outputs=None, burn_in=999, create_input=True, input_file=None, suppress=False, workdir=None, deleteWorkdir=False, timeout=30, basedir='../bayescmd', debug=False, testing=False)[source]¶

BCMD model class. this can be used to create inputs, run simulations etc.
